ads.name: AD01 - Quality Volume
ads.headline: Quality Problems Hide as Volume
ads.primary_text:
You don't have a lead volume problem. You have a lead quality problem disguised as volume.

Your vendor sends 100 MVA leads. Your intake qualifies 15. You sign 5. You blame intake for the 85 that didn't qualify.

But those 85 were never going to sign. They weren't real injury cases. They weren't high intent. They were clicks, not clients.

Here's the real solution:

Stop receiving leads. Start receiving signed cases.

We fund the marketing. We generate the demand. Our PI-trained intake team qualifies prospects and closes retainers on your behalf.

You don't touch the lead until it's already a case.

~$2,900 average cost per signed case. 30-50% conversion from warm transfer to closed.

No retainers. No setup fees. No ad spend required.

Quality isn't just upstream. It's delivery.
ads.description: We fund the ads. You receive signed cases.

ads.primary_text:

They're not dropping balls. They were handed garbage.

Here's the fix: Stop handing them garbage.

We pre-qualify every prospect before you see them:
‚úì Verified MVA injury

Your team stops sorting trash and starts working real cases.

87% partner retention

ads.name: AD10 - Comparison
ads.headline: The Real Cost Comparison
ads.primary_text:
How much are you really paying per signed MVA case?

**TV advertising:** $50,000/month. Maybe you get cases. Maybe not.

**Billboards:** $30,000/month. Brand awareness. No tracking.

**Lead vendors:** $200-500/lead. 5% close rate. $4,000+ per case after intake costs.

**Us:** ~$2,900 per signed case. Retainer already signed. Ready for your docket.

No monthly minimums. No wasted spend. No guessing.

You pay for signed cases. We handle everything else.

87% partner retention. 8 figures generated for client firms.

For attorneys signing 10+ cases/month.
ads.description: Compare the real cost per signed case.
